name: Corn Palak - Curried Corn and Greens
description: Corn Palak. Curried corn and Greens. Seasonal greens, chard and spinach with corn and spices make for a quick side, taco filling or addition to a salad. Vegan Gluten-free Soy-free Recipe.
recipeIngredient: 1/4 tsp coriander seeds (coarsely crushed in a mortar pestle or spice grinder)
1 tbsp finely chopped garlic (3 to 4 cloves)
1/2 tsp garam masala  (or use curry powder of choice)
2 cups chopped greens (chard, baby spinach etc, mix in some fresh dill for variation)
cilantro and lemon juice for garnish

recipeInstructions.text: Heat oil in a skillet over medium heat. Add coarsely crushed coriander seeds and let them cook for a minute. (or use 1/2 tsp ground coriander and add at step 2). Add onion and garlic and cook until translucent. 4 to 5 mins.
recipeInstructions.name: Heat oil in a skillet over medium heat. Add coarsely crushed coriander seeds and let them cook for a minute. (or use 1/2 tsp ground coriander and add at step 2). Add onion and garlic and cook until translucent. 4 to 5 mins.

recipeInstructions.text: Add the pepper flakes and corn and mix. Cook for 5 minutes. Add in the spices and cook for a minute.
recipeInstructions.name: Add the pepper flakes and corn and mix. Cook for 5 minutes. Add in the spices and cook for a minute.

recipeInstructions.text: Add in chopped greens, salt and 2 -3 tbsp of water. cover and cook for 5 minutes. mix well, taste and adjust salt and heat. Continue to cook for another 4 to 5 minutes until greens are wilted and corn is cooked to preference. Garnish liberally with cilantro and a dash of lemon.
recipeInstructions.name: Add in chopped greens, salt and 2 -3 tbsp of water. cover and cook for 5 minutes. mix well, taste and adjust salt and heat. Continue to cook for another 4 to 5 minutes until greens are wilted and corn is cooked to preference. Garnish liberally with cilantro and a dash of lemon.
